abstract.t: The Mobile Mesh Border Discovery Protocol (MMBDP) enables a mobile adhoc network to utilize a fixed/wired network for dissemination of routing information and for forwarding of data. MMBDP is one protocol in a set of related Mobile Mesh protocols that also includes the Mobile Mesh Link Discovery Protocol (MMLDP) and the Mobile Mesh Routing Protocol (MMRP). Together, these protocols provide a flexible, extensible mobile adhoc networking capability.
